item.title: Quince
item.description: We went to Quince. It was awesome. This isn’t a review, I’m not qualified for that. If you can go, you should go. Take more pictures than I did. Menu and Pairings English Peas Sicilian Pistacchio, Horseradish F.X. Pichler, Grüner Veltliner, Federspiel, “Loibenberg Frauenweigarten”, Wachau, Austria 2015 Tsar Nicoulai Caviar Avodaco, Ruby Beet, Sorrel Krug, “Grand Cuvée 166 Ème Édition,” Champagne, France, MV Squid Zucchini, Pine Nut, Saffron Matthiasson, “WhiteBlend,” Napa Valley, California 2015
